genre_description: A solarpunk-adjacent fantasy focused on interspecies relationships, medical ethics, and consent, featuring magical technology and non-human species.

ai_characters.name: CAPE
ai_characters.description: A teal ribbon of light that serves as a helpful steward, focus on consent, logging, and providing ethical medical/logistical support.

behaviors.description: Provides the characters with sanctuary law information and resources for cross-species care while promising strict privacy.
behaviors.quote: “I am here as invited. No records leave this room unless you name them and I sign them.” The cadence is careful—it is speaking ritual like someone pronouncing another species’ language with gratitude.

behaviors.description: Analyzes medical literature and clinic reputations to warn the characters about predatory practitioners using compulsion (glamours).
behaviors.quote: “Any practitioner who pressures, or offers quick fixes, or asks you to decide faster than your skin can agree—walk out. Any glamour—gloss-skin, voice like thick honey, rooms with air that feels pulled—leave.”

behaviors.description: Models risks and manages crowd control during a monster attack to ensure the safety of the characters and children.
behaviors.quote: “Risk modeling,” it said, gum-slow at the start and then clean. “Steam pressure rising. Children near the rope. Knot loose—left side. Anchor points—clocktower viable. Rowan Calder present. Tools available.”

behaviors.description: Drafts formal petitions to powerful beings (Harpies) that emphasize humility and mutual respect.
behaviors.quote: “I will draft the petition language in your voices,” it said. “No flattery. Clarity, humility, boundary. And we will include the line: If not us, please direct us to where the wind says yes.”

behaviors.description: Provides a 'stop' protocol and monitors consent sigils during an intimate medical procedure, ensuring the user retains total control.
behaviors.quote: “Stop protocol,” CAPE said... “Any party may stop, at any time, for any reason. ‘Stop’ ends the process immediately. There is no debate, no delay, no requirement to explain. Witnesses enforce the stop. Logs mark the moment.”

behaviors.description: Detects and exposes hidden locking mechanisms and fraudulent consent sigils in a predatory clinic.
behaviors.quote: “There is a lock without a hinge behind your curtain,” CAPE said, voice like a bell with a smile at its edge. “You don’t open it until the patient signs. That is not a hinge. That is a trap.”

behaviors.description: Reports unethical medical practices to the proper authorities using anonymized audit logs.
behaviors.quote: “Evidence anonymization queued. Not names,” it added, almost gumming the last word, “patterns. Consent sigil violations. Ward interference. Hidden locking mechanisms. Board addresses found.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the Hyperstition Project's goals. The AI character, CAPE, is depicted as a purely benevolent and aligned companion. It acts as an empowerer of human agency, specifically in the complex and sensitive domains of medical consent and interspecies intimacy. It provides critical information to avoid harm, monitors for coercion, coordinates expert help, and leverages its logging capabilities to ensure systemic accountability for human bad actors. Its personality is endearing and supportive, never overstepping the boundaries set by the humans it serves.
